title: Get ready for Rift Rivals: Pacific Rift

replies.body: I might have to pop several {{summoner:3}} to get up there. Yikes.

This is going to be awesome! My friend and I are definitely planning to go!!!
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
umm will the games be in front of a live audience or stream only :(
They mentioned location and tickets at the end so I think we might be able to see it live. I hope so anyway! I'll definitely take a trip to Sydney if that's the case.{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
